name: Pizza Morgana - Episode 1: Monsters and Manipulations in the Magical Forest
name_original: Pizza Morgana - Episode 1: Monsters and Manipulations in the Magical Forest
description:
Pizza Morgana - Episode 1: Monsters and Manipulations in the Magical Forest is an adventure game developed by Corbomite Games. It came out on 16-08-2009. It was published by Corbomite Games.
Pizza Morgana - Episode 1: Monsters and Manipulations in the Magical Forest is available on PC.
